short_summary: Encapsulation of existing wharf structure with berlin wall system at Carter’s Point Harbour Facility, Halifax County, NS.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), has a requirement for the encapsulation of the existing wharf structure with a berlin wall system, including the supply and installation of steel support piles, concrete panels, concrete deck, wheel guard and seawall, ladders, mooring cleats, electrical system upgrades, as well, a new launching ramp and expansion to the existing service area at the Department of Fisheries and Oceans – Small Craft Harbours (DFO-SCH) Carter’s Point Harbour Facility, Halifax County, NS. All elements of the work must be completed by June 30th, 2024.
